Boston Celtics players delivered a message to the White House on Saturday during their NBA Finals practice.
Bring Brittney Griner home.
Marcus Smart, Jaylen Brown, Grant Williams and other Celtics … [+2218 chars]

articles.title: 'What's More Likely' - Rich Eisen Talks Cowboys vs Eagles, Ja'Marr Chase vs Rookie WR's & More - The Rich Eisen Show
articles.description: In his ‘What’s More Likely’ segment Rich Eisen says if the Cowboys or Eagles will have the more potent offense next season and if Ja’Marr Chase can replicate...
